titleInfo.title: Faron Young at the Pikeville High Football Stadium (17997)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Faron Young, Jan Howard, Ken Allen, Peggy Sue, and others at the Pikeville High School Football Stadium on September 4. Poster features metal photoplates of Faron Young, Jan Howard, and Ken Allen. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22871.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
